description: EU finance ministers suspend talks on a recovery fund after 16 hours, amid deep divisions.
title: Coronavirus: Marathon talks over EU virus rescue package stall
title_page: Coronavirus: Marathon talks over EU virus rescue package stall - BBC News
maintext: "Because of the current crisis we have to make an exception and the ESM can be used unconditionally to cover medical costs," said Dutch Finance Minister Wopke Hoekstra. "For the long term economic support we think it's sensible to combine the use of the ESM with certain economic conditions."
